item.title: MIUI OS1.0.1.0.ULFJPXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 12T Pro Japan
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 12T Pro Japan

Codename: diting

Version: OS1.0.1.0.ULFJPXM | 14.0

Size: 6.3 GB

MD5: 3731469c72eb9e19babcf3f8c3004a33

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to May 2024. Increased system security.
[Vibrant aesthetics]
Global aesthetics draw inspiration from life itself and change the way your device looks and feels
New animation language makes interactions with your device wholesome and intuitive
Natural colors bring vibrancy and vitality to every corner of your device
Our all-new system font supports multiple writing systems
Redesigned Weather app not only gives you important information, but also shows you how it feels outside
Notifications are focused on important information, presenting it to you in the most efficient way
New Home screen icons refresh familiar items with new shapes and colors
Our in-house multi-rendering technology makes visuals delicate and comfortable across the whole system
Multitasking is now even more straightforward and convenient with an upgraded multi-window interface

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.6.0.ULFCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi K50 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi K50 Ultra China

Codename: diting

Version: OS1.0.6.0.ULFCNXM | 14.0

Size: 7.0 GB

MD5: e3e814b47106ee1689faa4588e0f2f8f

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Optimized memory usage to improve the smoothness of TikTok (Douyin)
Updated the security patch to July 2024. Increased system security.
[Widgets]
New: Travel assistant can notify you about your flights and train
Optimization: App vault loading speed
Fix: Zoom animation was abnormal when tapping the Music widget
Fix: A rare display issue occurred when adding the Clock widget
Fix: An incorrect name for Travel assistant was shown in Recents
[Calculator]
Optimization: Improved the sensitivity of Calculator buttons

Download: Here
